amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to improve the competitiveness of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 624 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 624 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Alexander.
